meaningMnemonic: Someone is offering you a <radical>shellfish</radical> in exchange for a <radical>kiss</radical>. This is a <kanji>bribe</kanji>! You don't want to kiss them, but that shellfish sure looks tasty.
readingMnemonic: You go through with the <kanji>bribe</kanji> and kiss the person, but then they snatch hold of the shellfish and run straight down the <reading>ro</reading>ad (ろ). No!!
